mapper.select: SELECT p.product_id, p.shop_id, p.name, p.image_url AS cover_image_url, COALESCE(MIN(s.price), 0) AS min_price, COALESCE(SUM(oi.num), 0) AS sales, m.merchant_name AS merchant_name FROM product p INNER JOIN product_category pc ON p.product_id = pc.product_id INNER JOIN shop sh ON p.shop_id = sh.shop_id LEFT JOIN merchant m ON sh.merchant_id = m.merchant_id LEFT JOIN sku s ON p.product_id = s.product_id LEFT JOIN order_item oi ON s.sku_id = oi.sku_id WHERE pc.category_id = #{categoryId} AND p.status = 1 AND sh.status = 1 GROUP BY p.product_id, p.shop_id, p.name, p.image_url, p.create_time, m.merchant_name ORDER BY p.create_time DESC LIMIT #{limit}
